0.name: Minnie
0.text: I can't get the door to open!

1.name: Minnie
1.text: Looks like we'll need to use brute force.

2.name: Minnie
2.text: [Ninten], do you need a reminder on how to run?

3.name: Minnie
3.text: This might sound odd, but imagine something called a [color][ui_toggle][/color] button.

4.name: Minnie
4.text: Then, [color]hold[/color] that button down [color]without moving to crouch.[/color]

5.name: Minnie
5.text: Once you're in that position, [color]release the button to start running.[/color]

6.name: Minnie
6.text: You can also just [color]hold down[/color] the [color][ui_toggle][/color] button while moving to run.
